description: Integrate seamlessly with your IDE and access all Opik features through a standardized protocol. Manage prompts, projects, and metrics efficiently with a unified interface. Leverage multiple transport options for flexible integration into various environments.

capabilities.name: opik-integration-docs
capabilities.description: Provides detailed documentation on how to integrate Opik with your LLM application

capabilities.name: get-prompts
capabilities.description: Get a list of prompts with optional filtering

capabilities.name: get-prompt-version
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific version of a prompt

capabilities.name: save-prompt-version
capabilities.description: Save a new version of a prompt

capabilities.name: list-projects
capabilities.description: Get a list of projects with optional filtering

capabilities.name: list-traces
capabilities.description: Get a list of traces from a project. Use this for basic trace retrieval and overview

capabilities.name: get-trace-by-id
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific trace including input, output, metadata, and timing information

capabilities.name: get-trace-stats
capabilities.description: Get aggregated statistics for traces including counts, costs, token usage, and performance metrics over time

capabilities.name: search-traces
capabilities.description: Advanced search for traces with complex filtering and query capabilities

capabilities.name: get-trace-threads
capabilities.description: Get trace threads (conversation groupings) to view related traces that belong to the same conversation or session

capabilities.name: add-trace-feedback
capabilities.description: Add feedback scores to a trace for quality evaluation and monitoring. Useful for rating trace quality, relevance, or custom metrics
